title: Game crashing after champ select
body: My game is continuously crashing and I ended up having to only remake one game so far, but it's really pissing me off.  It says Connection failed of some sort, I was told it was a bug by a friend. Any help is useful thanks.

replies.body:
There are some great steps to take in this guide that could resolve the issue. Crashing after champ select is often caused by a poor connection to the servers, and can be caused by many different factors. The connection guide goes over the most common solutions, so I'm confident that will get us going in the right direction to resolve this.

Let me know if you still see issues after taking those steps.
I've already repaired my game once... no corrupted files.
